Title: Relates to providing intake workers at homeless shelters with certain mental health training
Summary: Requires the commissioner of the department of social services to develop and provide training to intake workers at homeless shelters focused on how to identify and provide appropriate referrals to those suffering from mental health issues.
LawCode: Amd ยง17, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to mental health training for intake workers at homeless shelters
